metadata.title: CVE-2024-5693 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Offscreen Canvas did not properly track cross-origin tainting, which couldbe used to access image data from another site in violation of same-originpolicy. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 127, Firefox ESR < 115.12, andThunderbird < 115.12.

criterions.comment: mozjs38 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs52 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
